items.title: Beyond LLMs: How SandboxAQ’s large quantitative models could optimize enterprise AI
items.description: Alphabet spinout SandboxAQ is advancing large quantitative models to help enterprise AI optimize value creation.

items.title: OpenAI’s new hotline: Chat with ChatGPT anytime, anywhere
items.description: Users can now give ChatGPT a ring and ask questions. (800)-ChatGPT accepts any device that can make calls, even for those without a data plan

items.title: Slack is becoming an AI workplace: Here’s what that means for your job
items.description: Slack is evolving from a simple messaging app into an AI-powered workplace platform where digital agents work alongside humans.

items.title: GitHub is making its AI programming Copilot free for VS Code developers — with limits
items.description: The service leverages advanced AI models, including Anthropic’s Claude 3.5 Sonnet and OpenAI’s GPT-4o, with limits.

items.title: Salesforce drops Agentforce 2.0, brings reasoning AI to enterprise
items.description: Salesforce has unveiled Agentforce 2.0, introducing AI agents with human-like reasoning abilities that can autonomously handle complex business tasks,...
